name: chatide
description: ChatIDE is an open-source coding and debugging assistant that supports GPT/ChatGPT (OpenAI), and Claude (Anthropic). Supported models: [gpt4, gpt-3.5-turbo, claude-v1.3]. Import/export your conversation history. Bring up the assistant in a side pane by pressing cmd+shift+i.

commands.title: Update your OpenAI API Key for ChatIDE
Update your Anthropic API Key for ChatIDE

chatide.model.description: Select the AI model. You must have your own API key to use a model.

chatide.systemPrompt.default: You are a helpful programming assistant running inside VS Code. Every token you generate costs the user money, so generate output such that it is succinct, to the point, and doesn't repeat previous information. Don't summarize what you've said and don't give examples unless asked. Always provide code inside triple backticks.
chatide.systemPrompt.markdownDescription: The 'system' prompt provided to the model. Keep in mind that some models pay stronger attention to the system prompt than others. For models that don't have a dedciated affordance for system prompts, this will be prepended to the first user prompt.

chatide.maxLength.description: Set the maximum length for the generated text (aka max_tokens).

chatide.temperature.description: Set the temperature for controlling the randomness of the generated text.

chatide.highlightedCodeAwareness.description: [Experimental] Automatically include highlighted code in the prompt.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
